00008  * Manages a viewpoint to provide an offset for rendering.
00009  * */

00018          * Position is the center of view. So an object at position will be in the middle of the viewport.
00019          *
00020          * Parameters:
00021          * p - The position

00041          *
00042          * Returns:
00043          * Position with applied offset.
